org.biohipi.image.io

Class RasterCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.io.RasterCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageDecoder, ImageEncoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JpegCodec, PngCodec

    public abstract class RasterCodec
extends Object
implements ImageDecoder, ImageEncoder
    Abstract base class for objects that serve as both an ImageDecoder and ImageEncoder for a particular storage format (e.g., JPEG, PNG).

    • Method Detail

      • decodeHeaderAndImage

        public BioHipiImage decodeHeaderAndImage(InputStream inputStream)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: ImageDecoder
        Read and decode both image header and image pixel data from a Java InputStream. Both of these decoded objects can be accessed through the BioHipiImage object returned by this method.
        Specified by:
        decodeHeaderAndImage in interface ImageDecoder
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        Returns:
        image represented as a BioHipiImage
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from the input stream
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid

      • decodeImage

        public BioHipiImage decodeImage(InputStream inputStream,
                                BioHipiImageHeader imageHeader)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                IOException
        Default image decode method that uses the available ImageIO plugins.
        Specified by:
        decodeImage in interface ImageDecoder
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        imageHeader - image header that was previously initialized
        Returns:
        image represented as a BioHipiImage
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid or do not agree with image data
        IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from the input stream
        See Also:
        ImageDecoder.decodeImage(java.io.InputStream, org.biohipi.image.BioHipiImageHeader)
